description: Tax applicabality information header shown in quote document

value: Bemærk, at de gældende skatter kan ændre sig baseret på faktureringsdato og adresse på faktureringstidspunktet.
reference value: Please note that taxes applicable may change based on billing date and address at the time of invoicing.
description: Disclaimer message shown when taxes are added in quotes in exlc mode

value: Priserne inkluderer skatter og afgifter. Du kan se skattefordelingen, når fakturaen hæves.
reference value: Prices are inclusive of taxes. You can view the tax breakup when the invoice is raised.
description: Disclaimer when taxes are not shown but applicable when invoicing

value: Priserne er ikke inklusive skat. Skatter gælder pr. Faktureringsdato og adresse på faktureringstidspunktet.
reference value: Prices are not inclusive of taxes. Taxes will be applicable as per billing date and address at the time of invoicing.
description: Disclaimer when taxes are not shown but applicable when invocing

value: Bemærk, at de gældende skatter kan ændre sig baseret på faktureringsdato og adresse på faktureringstidspunktet.
reference value: Please note that taxes applicable may change based on billing date and address at the time of invoicing.
description: Disclaimer message shown in tax details when taxes are added in quote in inclusive mode
